mdRecord.dcterms:title: Iddings Cemetery, In Locust Grove District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located in the Locust Grove District of Floyd County just north (200 yards +/- ) of the intersection of Huffville Rd. and Daniels Mill Road. It can be seen from Daniel's Mill Road (driving north it is on the left) before you get to Goose Creek Rd. The actual entrance is down the driveway for 1416 Huffville Road which is at Huffville/Daniels Mill intersection exactly opposite of Terry's Fork Grocery.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
